post:
MilesWeb offers fully managed Linux VPS hosting plans powered by DigitalOcean are available in 4 sizes with various technical components, with benefits like built-in SSD storage, SSH access, guaranteed server resources and hardware raid protection.

Get 25% OFF on first month invoice of V1, V2, V3, V4, V5 managed Linux VPS hosting plans. Enter promo code XMASVPS during checkout. Renewal would be at regular price.
